alert.note: Alert for Niobrara (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:23PM MDT until June 29 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NIOBRARA...NORTHWESTERN GOSHEN...NORTHEASTERN PLATTE AND SOUTHEASTERN CONVERSE COUNTIES... At 323 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Rawhide Buttes, or 16 miles southwest of Lusk, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rawhide Buttes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Wyoming. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
